paragraphs.title: Clean environment
Prepare table
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc
USE demo_json;

-- Example #01: definition
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS demo_json.products (
    id INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
    type VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL,
    name VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL,
    format VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    price FLOAT(5, 2) NOT NULL,
    attr JSON NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT attr_valid CHECK (JSON_VALID(attr))
);

SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE
  FROM information_schema.`COLUMNS`
 WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'demo_json'
   AND TABLE_NAME = 'products';

TRUNCATE TABLE products;

msg.data:
COLUMN_NAME	DATA_TYPE
id	int
type	varchar
name	varchar
format	varchar
price	float
attr	longtext

paragraphs.title: Populate table

paragraphs.text:
%jdbc
USE demo_json;

-- Example #03: read field
SELECT type, name, format, price, 
    JSON_VALUE(attr, '$.video.aspectRatio') AS aspect_ratio
FROM products;

-- Example #04: contains field
SELECT name, format, price,
    JSON_VALUE(attr, '$.video.aspectRatio') AS aspect_ratio
FROM products
WHERE
    JSON_CONTAINS_PATH(attr, 'one', '$.video.resolution') = 1;

-- Example #05: contains value
SELECT id, name, format, price
FROM products
WHERE type = 'M' AND
    JSON_CONTAINS(attr, '\"DTS HD\"', '$.audio') = 1;

-- Example #06: read array
SELECT name, format, price, 
    JSON_QUERY(attr, '$.audio') AS audio
FROM products;

-- Example #07: read array element
SELECT name, format, price, 
    JSON_VALUE(attr, '$.audio[0]') AS default_audio
FROM products;

-- Example #08: read object
SELECT name, format, price, 
    JSON_QUERY(attr, '$.video') AS video
FROM products;

-- Example #09: read objects
SELECT name, 
    JSON_QUERY(attr, '$.audio') AS audio,
    JSON_QUERY(attr, '$.video') AS video
FROM products;

-- Example #10: field equals
SELECT id, name, format, price
FROM products
WHERE
	JSON_VALUE(attr, '$.video.resolution') = '1080p';

msg.data:
type	name	format	price	aspect_ratio
M	Aliens	Blu-ray	13.99	1.85:1
B	Foundation	Paperback	7.99	null

name	format	price	aspect_ratio
Aliens	Blu-ray	13.99	1.85:1

id	name	format	price
4	Aliens	Blu-ray	13.99

name	format	price	audio
Aliens	Blu-ray	13.99	["DTS HD", "Dolby Surround"]
Foundation	Paperback	7.99	null

name	format	price	default_audio
Aliens	Blu-ray	13.99	DTS HD
Foundation	Paperback	7.99	null

id	name	format	price
4	Aliens	Blu-ray	13.99
